name: Darkade
description:
Have you ever wondered what lies beyond the bounds of an old arcade screen?

Darkade is a combination of Breakout/Arcade and Surreal/Horror/Puzzle genres, made for Ludum Dare 41 Jam, theme: "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

Can you uncover all of its secrets?

Controls:
* Arrows - movement
* Space - hold to go faster
* ESC - exit game
* Alt+Enter - to switch between full screen and windowed mode.
